data.text: @Floreum Hope you have a speedy recovery! Glad it's only mild so far as well.
@Floreum Get well soon. Drink lots of water and take Pedialyte if possible! Rest easy!

@Floreum @thirteeenth That was one of the worst parts about it to me. Sore throat goes away, you start to feel better, and it comes right back. Not too terrible a symptom in the cosmic scheme of things, but at least bad enough to be irritating

@ChromaKoros @thirteeenth Both my mom and dad were coughing, I've just had a tickle in my lungs for days now. Just today felt like it was finally kicking up. But all my symptoms keep coming and going right now.
@Floreum Take reallll good care of yourself. It can be no joke, as you know.

@Floreum @thirteeenth Hope it stays mild like that! Though I will say if it's Omicron expect to start coughing after a few days, and a persistent headache. Only speaking from personal experience, of course! Symptoms vary so much you may not even get that
@thirteeenth It's super mild right now, just a sore throat that seems to come and go,  and a minor stuffed nose.
@Floreum Sorry to hear, hope you get through it alright.
